projects.title: Draft-Helper
projects.description: Fantasy Football Draft Helper: Allows user to keep track of the best players available during drafts. User can save the team they drafted as well.
projects.technologiesUsed: React, CRUD, Sass, Axios, API, Firebase, promises, async await, JSON, Bootstrap, esLint, Task Autoutmations, User Authentication

projects.title: Local Weather
projects.description: Find your current weather and five day forecast for any given zipcode. Also, save your favorite forecasts with the option to mark any as scary or delete one.
projects.technologiesUsed: jQuery, AJAX, crud, authentication, JSON, promises, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Github, Browserify, esLint, api's, firebase

projects.title: Ex-Tracker
projects.description: Assuming user wants to avoid his/her exes, user can keep track of exes frequented locations and times. Creepy? Yes. Practical? Maybe. Funny? Yes.
projects.technologiesUsed: promises, jQuery, JSON, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Github, Browserify, ,grunt, esLint, bootstrap
